name: River Town - Farming Role Play Game with Heartwarming Story
blurb: Story-driven farming \u0010RPG for PC/Mac/Linux. Immersive gameplay and deep dialogues with a hint of The Sims and Harvest Moon.

rewards.reward: Every little helps ************************************************* Our eternal love and gratitude, and access to backers-only updates.

Early Bird Farmer! ************************************************* [1] Digital, DRM-free, with Kickstarter-exclusive content copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! (PC, Mac, Linux) [2] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info).

Farmer\r\n************************************************* \r\n[1] Digital, DRM-free, with Kickstarter-exclusive content copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! (PC, Mac, Linux) [2] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info).

Art Lover
*************************************************
[1] Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork!
[2] Digital DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! [3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls.

Beta Farmer
*************************************************
[1] Be one of the first putting his paws on River Town! Participate in closed beta tests and help shape the game!
[2] You'll get a "Beta Tester" badge on our forum, access to Beta Tester-only section on our forums
[3] Your name will be listed in credits under "Beta Testers" section [4] Digital DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms!

Tea time!\r\n*************************************************\r\n[1] We'll send you our shiny and adorable mug to your home! [2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! [3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls. [4] Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Trendy Farmer\r\n*************************************************\r\n[1] Get our original t-shirt and spread the love! [2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! [3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls [4]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Craftsman
*************************************************
[1] We'll design and implement an item of your desire! Allowed categories: Food (Fruit/Vegetable/Meal), Flower, Outfit element. Your item, among others, will be on a front cover of the art book!
[2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms!
[3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls. [4]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

My name is...
*************************************************
[1] We'll give your name, or the one you love, to one of the River Town's villagers! (offensive words not allowed) [2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms!
[3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info). [4]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Partnership
*************************************************
[1] Show your support by placing logo and website address of your indie studio (or other, acceptable business) in credits under "Partners" section, and on the website too!
[2] We'll send you a "certificate" of partnership to your home or business address as a way of saying 'thank you' for your support! (by the way, these look gorgeous on a wall!)
[3] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms!
[4] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Your Pet ************************************************* [1] We'll add your pet to the game! Send us a picture of your pet and we'll do the magic to put it into the game! [2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! [3] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info). [4] Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Tell your story.
*************************************************
[1] We will work with you to implement your story into an event or quest!
[2] Digital, DRM-free copy of River Town for all supported desktop platforms! [3] We'll send you a lovely River Town mug!
[4] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info). [5]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Someone like you
*************************************************
[1] We'll work with you to design a villager that lives in River Town! Design his/her appearance, favourite items, short story background and specify where he/she hangs out! (worry not, we'll deal with all technical stuff)
[2] We'll send you a lovely mug with the character you've designed!
[3] Boxed version of River Town with YOUR character on a cover! (for one of the supported desktop platforms).
[4] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info).
[5]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork!
[6] We'll send you a handwritten "thank you" letter! + "Beta Farmer" rewards

Interior Designer
*************************************************
[1] Design an interior (or send us photos of the flat), and we'll turn it into a cartoon-themed home for one of the villagers! (worry not, we'll deal with all technical stuff)
[2] We'll send you a lovely mug with your in-game flat!
[3] Boxed version of River Town, signed by creators.
[4] "Backer" badge on our forum, which will allow you to vote in our backers-only polls (see stretch goals for more info).
[5]  Digital book with exclusive and unpublished artwork!
[6] We'll send you a handwritten "thank you" letter! + "Beta Farmer" rewards
